Blog.post: The Late Isabel Twitch Records 2004 I bought this album sa Sarabia Optical sa UP Shopping Center, along with RSP's Before Monkey Jump Give Him Banana . The lady in the shop was weird. Hehe. When I entered, she was talking to a foreigner with big hair, and she had this weird accent that gave me the creeps. Hehe. Anways.. This album is the sh!t! Really. If you like listening to Black Metal or the like (Cradle of Filth, Dimmu Borgir, etc) but are afraid of what your elders might say to you, then this thing is a must for you. FHM classified the band as Goth Pop, but I classify them as Pop-Rock with Dark Undertones (not underarms! haha). The CD has 8 tracks which will never put you to sleep if you listen to them consecutively. The title track is pretty engaging, and is a good introduction to the rest of the album. The song features distorted guitars, a bluesy-jazzy bassline, danceable drums and Wawi Navarroza 's Shirley Manson (Garbage) meets Dolly Burton (Cranberries) meets Sandra Nasic (Guano Apes) voice. Quite interesting blend, huh? The rest of the album are mostly comprised of clean, reverberated guitars, subtle basslines, minimalistic drumbeats and a highly echoey vocal track. I think there is too much reverb on the vocals sometimes, as in Midnight City . Too much reverb sometimes does not make the vocals sit in with the rest of the instruments. But Zach Lucero (nU107 jock) mixed the album, so I think the reverb thing was intended. The songs on the album follow the same old classic gothic kind of lyricism ( ".. I whisper to you with a hollow breath now.. And now I start carrying you like a baby, and how you would cry like a penitent man.." from Carrying You Like a Baby ) , with radio-friendly hooks here and there, which makes the songs easy on the ears of many listeners. On a scale of 1 to 10, I give this CD an 8 . It was good, but the band could do better.

Sandwich I'll make this short.. Yes, <s>andwich has gone indie again. It shows in the recording quality of their new album. Right Now exemplifies their indie sound (again). Filipinos really have a knack for the indie sound . The album is sweet but forgettable (taken from Simon Cowell 's remark on one of Jasmine Trias ' performances). Four-track Mind is still better, way lot better. Although "Thanks.." has its share of the usual Sandwich melodies ( Marc Abaya 's crooning on 2 Trick Pony ) and witty (take Nahuhulog ), ear-friendly ( Masilungan ), no-brainer ( Astroholiday , thanks to Raimund Marasigan 's lyricism) songwriting, the songs on the album just don't mix well. I didn't find myself paying attention to certain parts of the album.. maybe the songs are good on their own, but they just don't mix together well, like oil and water. Sandwich improved their musical abilities, but their sound remains much the same. The album weaves a mystical concoction of one-liners and two-liners in your brain, which makes the experience sweet, but forgettable. It's like the Men in Black flashing the (oh my God i forgot the name right before I type this!) at you after you listen to the album. Oh well, you could always listen to the album again. Maybe I just need a second helping of it. :)

Hindi kasi gumagana yung email ko eh, kaya dito ko nalang nilagay. Italicized ang corrections 3. Topic Sentence: Singapore has found that the key to national success is quality education. I. Despite being a small nation and a mixture of races and languages, Singapore’s academic achievements are amazing. A. B. --- scientific discoveries, researches… etc. ng Singapore. II. Singapore’s educational system is now the topic of research for being one of the best in the world. A. It is considered better than America’s. B. 90% of Singaporean Universities are in the A-E league which means their quality of education is nearly perfect. (Di ako sure dito, ginawa ko lang ganyan para hindi nakakalito) C. The National University of Singapore is ranked highly in Asia. III. The students’ learning is the pride and inspiration of the school authorities. A. & B. --- projects ng authorities to improve/ develop education, facilities… etc. 4. Topic Sentence: The trend of life seems to follow a general pattern. I. In the past years, I’ve been through times of extreme highs. A. I met new people who became my friends . B. I went out with a few special girls and developed relationships with them. C. Doing my best in areas of athletics like track and field and baseball was gratifying. II. However, there were also times of depression and loneliness. A. Breaking out of a relationship B. Add anything 5. Topic Sentence: Preparations for the end of Ramadan begin long before the date is fixed. I. A festive occasion always mark the end of a religiously observed Ramadan. Hindi ba parang baligtad ang topic sentence at yung roman numeral 1? A. New clothes have to be bought and elaborate meals planned for the holy day. B. isa pa II. Non-Muslims also leave and rest during the holidays A. In Malaysia and Indonesia, millions leave the cities for family get-togethers at their ancestral homes in the countryside. B. Kuala Lumpur and Jakarta become virtually ghost towns. 1. To accommodate the great exodus, buses, trains and airlines are greatly expanded. III. Indeed, it becomes a day for reconciliation. A. They ask forgiveness for any ill feelings they harbored for each other. B. Even enemies embrace. i ko maisip itong number na to! Ihahabol ko na lang

Mel's blog... I just read it before doing this. wala akong maisip na title 7:19 p.m. 2004-07-20 hrgh.. long time, pare. =P grabe super super busy talaga ngayon. we thought it was our phone line that didnt work but it was the modem pala. im using laptop ngayon.. last saturday.. we had pt sa cat. HAHA.. i loved it. lalo na yung push-ups! as if! pero di nga.. kaya ko na pero parang mej mababali yung buto ko sa kamay kasi medyo patpat diba! pero my muscles.. HEHE tigas to. tigas-tigasan.. at the end of the whole training.. biglang nagblack out ako oh! haha.. medyo weird pero akala ko talaga nabulag na ko! i cant explain how i felt that time pero grabe lang talaga. kakaiba. and yung ears ko.. super lamig. maiqui experienced that na pala.. and.. kelly and.. i dont know who else. pero yung after long test.. yung PATAKDA na.. ang saya kasi katabi ko si carl! hehehe.. ang kulit..nung nagiinspect na salita lang ng salita pramis kung anu anu yung sinasabi tapos sasabihin pa 3rd squad 2nd element quit sounding off.. eh ako yun eh siya naman yung maingay! HAHAHA.. kaht dun sa gym.. hahaa tapos nagsquat yung squad namin kasi si carl di marunong magalign.. hehehe joke lang carl baka nababasa mo to =P pumasok na si jegillos! wuhoo astig.. cras ko yun kahit 2nd yr palang hehehe cute yun.. pati si dellosa ok din pero jegillos parin! wuhoo after cat.. happy, maiqui, nitz, pams, tepang and i went to happy's house in mandaluyong to take a bath. went back to greenhills after.. si happy she met up with pinggoy.. YEAHHH.. and me with sila maiqui nitz pams and tepang naman.. ate in tokyotokyo. while we were eating someone named MAC.. sent pams a video through bluetooth.. na ano.. eew.. basta.. kadire. pero no effect.. HAHA. de joke.. medyo tinamad na ko kumain nakakasuka kasi eh sarap upakan nung mac na yun we went dun sa podium/greenbelt part in gh after tokyotokyo and we bought happy a gift. it was a white halter top from folded and hung.. =) galing namen pumili eh.. JOKE LANG. pero sana happy liked it. pag punta namin theatre happys with pinggoy [miguel].. ok yung pinggoy hehe.. friend niya ata si charles or benson! haha.. yeaaah.. umalis na ata kame ng 6 sa greenhilss papunta antipolo.. si tepang and pams sa car ni josh with derrick and tom.. kame ni maiqui nitz happy sa car ni happy.. nag-hhi kame ni nitz sa mga tao na nadadaanan namen hahaha =P mga 7 na kame sa antipolo! dun na classmates nila hap and yun.. astig kaya yung house! dumagdag yung pool and parang bahay kubo na mas ok! basta yung house sa 30 days sa GMA.. yun yung house nila happy! yeaah naman! ano.. ang ok ni hershey! parang siya nageentertain ng mga guests.. si harvard.. kamuka ni luis manzano! pramiss.. hehehe umalis kame magt-ten.. we arrved sa greenhills ng i cant remember. kasama ko sila maiqui.. happy.. and hershey.. we stayed sa strbucks.. nagjelly coffee ako or coffee jelly.. ah basta yun! si happy busy katext si pinggoy eh! hehe daya talaga ni happy! =P ang ok kaya ni pingoy.. si hershey din.. super baet.. sabi ni happy he asked for my number.. eh second time na niya inask yun actually pero hindi talaga nagttext. medyo umaasa rin kasi mga tao diba? hehehe joke lang. hahaha.. text ni pams sakin kahapon kasi absent ako.. "bat di pumasok yung isang babae dyan?!" tapos.. "tigas yung mga pumasok ng monday! lambot yung hindi!" wahaha.. gago.. sobrang corny na nakakatawa na nakakadire!!! eek.. hehehe tapos sino kaya absent ngyon? SIYA! lambot.. hahaha uy ang daming peexx namin nung saturday pero nawawala yung apple na pang transfer ng memory card eh! oh well.. haba eh noh! tagal na kasi eh.. hahaha ay nakakatawa pala kanina kasi si nicolo nahuli ng phone tapos gagawa siya ng letter for ms.duran.. ang gumawa si icey! tapos mga nakasulat.. hahaha.. "pls dont take my phone away from me bec thats the one thing i use to communicate with my friends in this harsh world.." WAHAHA.. pramisss ay, sige na have to go.. pinapaalis na ko dito BYE I don't know what to say.. It's been around + 48 hours since we stopped texting each other. And I really miss her. You know what I did after she texted me " ...wag na lang tayong magtxt. tss "? I erased all her numbers in my phonebook. But you know what? I still remember +6391--4--77- in my mind very clearly, as well as 7---55-.. I miss Mel. Walang kwentang araw .. We had a boring Math lecture . In Geol 11 , we only discussed our recently concluded first long test. I was sitting in the back and it was sooooooooooooooo boring . What more? Wala na naman si Prof Corpus , may seminar daw .. and on his cubicle door was posted " See you on Monday " (that's what THEY told me)! Damn may SONA naman sa Monday ah, at dapat lang na mawala yung test namin sa Geol 11.1 kasi sa hapon yun, at may long test din ako sa Math 17 that day! Haha. Oh before I forget: urlLink www.tickle.com ! Hmm.. Walang kuwentang araw kasi marami akong `di nagawa. Una, di ko nasamahan si April pauwi ( hindi kasi buo ang araw ko pag hindi ko ginagawa yun eh . =D ). Tapos, hindi ako nag lunch ( pano tinatamad ako, hehe ).. Sunod, hindi ako... uh... yun lang eh . Actually kahit hindi ako mag lunch ok lang . :D Pero `di pa naman tapos ang araw. Tinext ako ni Jennylyn sabi niya asa SM North Edsa siya ng 5 pm ! Wahu pupunta ako . :D Mm.. Yun. Sana nga pala makapag decide na si April kung saan siya magshishift ( sana wag na lang hehe, but it's her decision anyway). Yun . Bye for now. urlLink http://www.liquidgeneration.com/sabotage/vision_sabotage.asp urlLink http://www.liquidgeneration.com/sabotage/escher_sabotage.asp Boto niyo nga pala si Anna at/o Janna sa 30 Days. :D

Right.. Sometimes I want to hate Blogger.. I already made a fucking post, then it failed to publish! Oh well.. Woke up at 9 , so I had to hurry, for Math 17 was at 10 . Math 17 : Boring Soc. Sci. 1 : Not boring English 1 : Quite okay.. I actually wanted to cut it because I wanted to help April out in her Philo exam. But my decision to attend it worked for the best. We had a recorded exercise at the end of the class. Kas 1 : No prof! I was going to the classroom, holding a glass of corn in my hand and a glass of ice coffee in the other, when I met my classmates who said "JM walang klase!". Haha I was overjoyed. So I went to NIGS to consult my Geol 11.1 Prof about the upcoming exam, only to find out from my syllabus that he was only around from 10 to 12am on Tuesdays to Fridays! Damn. So I went to that tree (I actually hesitated and tried to feel if it was the second one nearest to the pathway or the third one) that meant a lot to me and wrote a song under it. :) Oh I'm at a computer shop by the way.. And tomorrow's the opening of I, Robot . Bye for now. Last song heard: 311 (and The Cure )- Love Song

Red shirt, red shorts, red shoes, red bag, red cap, red rubber band on my wrist. Red. Last time, I got hit by the love bug.. Now I don't know how I should feel.. I wore red today, as well as last Monday. I'm feeling fucked up, as in. I think my heart is gonna burst anytime. By the way, we had a long test in Geol 11.. I crammed my review the night before and hours before the exam. I was totally fucked! It wasn't a total disaster, but I hated it..

IN 100 DAYS by Anonymous Author Peter and Tina are sitting in the park doing nothing, but just gazing into the sky, while all their friends are having fun with their beloved half. Tina: I'm so bored. Just wish I have a boyfriend now to spend time with. Peter: I guess we're the only leftovers. We're the only person who isn't with a date now. (both sigh in silence for a while) Tina: I think I have a good idea. Lets play a game. Peter: Eh? What game? Tina: Eem... It's quite simple. You be my boyfriend for 100 days and I'll be your girlfriend for 100 days. what do you think? Peter: Oookay... Anyway I don't have any plan for the next few months. Tina: You sound like you aren't looking forward to it at all. Cheer up. Today will be our first day and our first date. Where should we go? Peter: What about a movie? I heard that there is a really great movie in theater now. Tina: Seems like I don't have any better idea than this. Lets move. (went to watch their movies and sent each other home) Day 2: Peter and Tina went to a concert together, and Peter bought Tina a keychain with a star. Day 3: They went shopping together for a friend's birthday present. Share an ice-cream together and hugged each other for the first time. Day 7: Peter drove Tina up onto a mountain and they watch the sunset together. When the night came and the moon glowed, they said sat on the grass gazing at the stars together. A meteor passed by. Tina mumbled something. Day 25: Spend time at a themepark and got onto rollercoasters, and ate hotdogs and cotton candy. Peter and Tina got in the haunted house and Tina grabbed someone's hand instead of Peter's hand by accident. They laughed together for a while. Day 67: They drove pass a circus and decided to get in to watch the show. The midget asked Tina to play a part as his assistant in the magic show. Went around to see other entertainments around after the show. Came to a fortune teller and she just said "Treasure every moment from now on" and a tear rolled down the fortune teller's cheek. Day 84: Tina suggested that they go to the beach. The beach wasn't so crowded that day. They have their first kiss with each other just as the sun is setting. Day 99: They decided to have a simple day and is deciding to have a walk around the city. They sits down onto a bench. 1:23 pm Tina: I'm thirsty. Lets rest for a while first. Peter: Wait here while I go buy some drinks. What would you like? Tina: Eem... Apple juice will be just fine. 1:43 pm Tina waiting for about 20 minutes and Peter havent return. Then someone walked up to her. Stranger: Is your name Tina? Tina: Yes, and may I help you? Stranger: Just now down there on the street a drunk driver has crashed into a guy. I think its your friend. Tina ran over to the spot with the stranger and sees Peter lying on the floor with blood over his face and her apple juice still in his hands. The ambulance came and she went to the hospital with Peter. Tina sat outside the emergency room for five and a half hours. The doctor came out, and he sigh. 11:51 pm Doctor: I'm sorry, but we did the best we could. He is still breathing now but God would take him away from us very soon. We found this letter inside his pocket. The doctor hands over the letter to Tina and she goes into the room to see Peter. He look weak but peaceful. Tina read the letter and then she burst into tears. Here is what the letter said: "Tina, our 100 days is almost over. I had fun with you during all these days. Although you may be greedy sometimes and less thoughtful, but these all brought happiness into my life. I have realize that you are a really cute girl and blamed myself for never taken the time to knowing that. I have nothing much to ask for, but I just wish that we can extend the day. I want to be your boyfriend forever and wish that you can be beside me all the time. Tina, I love you." 11:58 Tina: (sobbing) Peter. Did you know what was the wish I made on the night there was a meteor. I asked God to let us last forever. We were suppose to last 100 days so Peter! You can't leave me! I LOVE YOU, but can you come back to me now? I love you Peter. I LOVE YOU. As the clock struck twelve, Peter's heart stopped beating. It was 100 days. Send this to EVERYONE you love or hate... just everyone that has taken a part in your life. Tell the guy or girl that you love them before its too late. You never know whats going to happen tomorrow. You never know who will be leaving you and never return "Super Star There You Are, Shining so Freely on my mind"

yeah, like, I wasn't really in love with you pala .. Haha, baka naman ngayon lang 'to ... Asshole. Nanonood pa naman ako ng Simpsons lagi sa StarWorld. Now what the fuck? Sinira mo, sinira mo lahat! I’m in conniptions for the final act you came here for The one derivative you manage is the one I abhor I need a minute to elaborate for everyone the Everyday bullshit things that you have done Your impossible ego fuck is like a Megalomaniacal tab on my tongue You fuckin’ touch me I will rip you apart I’ll reach in and take a bite out of that Shit you call a heart... I don’t mind being ogled, ridiculed Made to feel miniscule If you consider the source, it’s kinda pitiful The only thing you really know about me is......that’s all you’ll ever know I know why you blame me (yourself) I know why you plague me (yourself) I’m turning it around like a knife in the shell I wanna understand why, but I’m hurting myself I haven’t seen a lotta reasons to stop it I can’t just drop it I’m just a bastard, but at least I admit it At least I admit it I know why you blame me (yourself) I know why you plague me (yourself) Kill you - fuck you - I will never be you Kill you - fuck you - I will never be you I can’t fuckin’ take it anymore A snap of the synapse And now it’s fuckin’ war Kill you - fuck you - I will never be you Thanks to my homey Corey! My Happy Fucking Ending asshole... Oh oh, oh oh..So much for my happy ending Oh oh, oh oh..So much for my happy ending Oh oh, oh oh, oh oh Let's not talk this over We're already dead Maybe it's something I did Or it was something you said You left me hanging In a city so dead Held up so high On such a breakable thread You were all the things I thought I knew And I thought we could be [Chorus:] You were everything, everything that I wanted We were meant to be, supposed to be, but we lost it All of the memories, so close to me, just fade away All this time you were pretending So much for my happy ending Oh oh, asshole . All the shit you hide from me All the fuck that you do You were in my mind, all this time And I thought you were mine [Chorus] It's nice to know that you were there Fuck you for acting like you care And making me feel like I was the only one We really didn't have it all Is it really fun watching me fall And letting me know we were done? Mel was everything, everything that I wanted We were meant to be, supposed to be, but I lost it All of the memories, so close to me, just fade away All this time she was pretending So much for my happy ending [Chorus][x2] Oh oh, oh oh, (in background Fuck you, asshole ) So much for my happy ending, Oh oh, oh oh.....Oh oh, oh oh, oh oh, oh oh.. Haha, yung ang naririnig ko pag nakikinig ako ng kantang yan eh. Sorry ha? Haha.

Two Thursdays ago.. July 22, 2004 : I went to SM North Edsa to attend Jen 's album promotion. I thought I was late (for the schedule was at 1700 but I arrived there at 1745), but I wasn't; she arrived late too, for she came from a taping at GMA. I brought my copy of her album, and after the show, I waited for a whole hour to get it signed. Fuck the grudgy stupid guard. I got my CD and my cap signed (she was left-handed!), and I also got a poster. I had so many things I wanted to say to her, but I ended up speechless when it was my turn to get an autograph. Anyways, I got to give her my poem I wrote earlier that day. All's well that ends well. :) Thursday last week: July 29, 2004 : One hell of a reunion... I went to visit Pisay with my friends.. Wow, everything changed.. even the people! There were indeed a lot of changes, but I think things have become too boring there. Haha. We went there to claim our diplomas and check out the people and places. Saturday: July 31, 2004 : Oh my, Level of Significance has reunited for one and a half our of practice at Red Damien Rehearsal Studio! We were a little bit rusty, but we got Ocean Avenue ( Yellowcard ), 2-Trick Pony ( Sandwich ), and The Reason ( Hoobastank ) right in a few tries. I had a hard time singing The Reason , but it was fulfilling anyway. Today: I'm in love with somebody who doesn't want to.. Maybe she's afraid to.. I don't know. I don't know what to do. Can somebody help me? I miss Mel.
